metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Serves cold or reheat before serving.
Ingredients: feta cheese, red onion, and feta cheese.

Cook fish until golden and cooked through. Serve fish in taco shells or tortillas with desired toppings. General Tso's Chicken Important Tokens: bowl mix flour cornmeal paprika cumin salt pepper Dip fish fillets buttermilk coat flour mixture Heat vegetable oil skillet medium Nouns: flour fish oil cornmeal vegetable buttermilk cumin mix heat skillet mixture salt pepper
Top with cherry tomatoes and drizzle with olive oil.
Marinate chicken pieces in the mixture for at least 30 minutes.

- Ingredients : o 1 pound chicken breast o 1/4 cup coconut milk o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 2 tablespoons peanut butter o 1 tablespoon curry powder o 1 tablespoon brown sugar o Skewers - Instructions : o Cut chicken into strips and thread onto skewers. o Mix coconut milk, soy sauce, peanut butter, curry powder, and brown sugar in a bowl. Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 1 hour. o Grill or broil until cooked through. o Serve with peanut sauce.
Roll up the tortilla tightly and slice in half. Important Tokens: Lay tortilla flat spread BBQ sauce evenly Add chicken, cheese, and coleslaw mix.
